Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hello! How can I assist you today with News Break? If you have any questions or need help, feel free to ask!
We would like to partner up with you.

That's great to hear! For partnership inquiries, please email our team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with your proposal and any relevant details. They'll be happy to discuss potential collaboration opportunities with you.
What is your reporting timezone for each ad account?

The reporting timezone for each ad account on NewsBreak is set to Pacific Time (PST). However, you can customize your own timezone in the Ad Manager settings. Keep in mind that the budget timezone will always remain in PST regardless of any customization.
The currency used for transactions on NewsBreak is US Dollars (USD).

It seems like there's a temporary issue with the ad platform. While our team is working on resolving it, I recommend checking out our API Integration Guide for any setup or configuration details you might need. You can find it here: [API Integration Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide). If the issue persists, please reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
I need to talk with agent or real human

I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If your issue requires further assistance, I can guide you on how to contact our support team via email.
